dhikr_list.name: SubhanAllah
dhikr_list.reason: Recited 33 times after each of the five daily prayers, based on a hadith of the Prophet (PBUH).

dhikr_list.name: Alhamdulillah
dhikr_list.meaning: All praise is due to Allah
dhikr_list.reason: Recited 33 times after each of the five daily prayers, in the same hadith where SubhanAllah is mentioned.

dhikr_list.name: Allahu Akbar
dhikr_list.reason: Recited 34 times after prayers, completing the cycle of dhikr as recommended in the hadith.

dhikr_list.name: La ilaha illallah
dhikr_list.meaning: There is no deity worthy of worship except Allah
dhikr_list.reason: The Prophet (PBUH) recommended saying this dhikr 100 times a day for immense reward and forgiveness of sins.

dhikr_list.name: Astaghfirullah
dhikr_list.reason: The Prophet (PBUH) would seek forgiveness 100 times a day, setting an example for Muslims.

dhikr_list.name: La hawla wa la quwwata illa billah
dhikr_list.arabic: لَا حول ولا قوة إلا بالله
dhikr_list.meaning: There is no power and no strength except with Allah
dhikr_list.reason: Reciting this frequently brings peace and relief, as it acknowledges Allah’s control over all affairs.

dhikr_list.name: SubhanAllah wa bihamdihi
dhikr_list.meaning: Glory be to Allah and all praise is due to Him
dhikr_list.reason: The Prophet (PBUH) said whoever says this 100 times in a day will have their sins forgiven, even if they are like the foam of the sea.

dhikr_list.name: SubhanAllahi wa bihamdihi, SubhanAllahi al-Azim
dhikr_list.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ، سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ
dhikr_list.meaning: Glory be to Allah and all praise is due to Him; Glory be to Allah, the Greatest
dhikr_list.reason: This dhikr combines two forms of glorification and brings great rewards, often recited 100 times for extra blessings.

dhikr_list.name: Hasbunallahu wa ni’mal wakeel
dhikr_list.meaning: Allah is sufficient for us, and He is the best disposer of affairs
dhikr_list.reason: Traditionally recited 7 times in times of distress or difficulty to express complete reliance on Allah.

dhikr_list.name: La ilaha illa anta subhanaka inni kuntu minaz-zalimeen
dhikr_list.arabic: لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنْتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
dhikr_list.meaning: There is no deity except You; Glory be to You, indeed I have been of the wrongdoers
dhikr_list.reason: Reciting this frequently is a powerful way to seek Allah's mercy and forgiveness.

dua_list.name: Dua for Guidance
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, guide us among those You have guided.

dua_list.name: Dua for Forgiveness
dua_list.meaning: My Lord, forgive me and have mercy on me.

dua_list.name: Dua for Patience
dua_list.meaning: O my Lord, expand for me my chest (with assurance).

dua_list.name: Dua for Seeking Knowledge
dua_list.meaning: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.

dua_list.name: Dua for Strength
dua_list.meaning: Allah is sufficient for us, and He is the best disposer of affairs.

dua_list.name: Dua for Protection
dua_list.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا صَنَعْتُ
dua_list.transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min sharri ma sanat
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done.

dua_list.name: Dua for Peace
dua_list.transliteration: Allahumma anta as-salam wa minka as-salam
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, You are Peace and from You comes Peace.

dua_list.name: Dua for Well-being
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, I ask You for well-being.

dua_list.name: Dua for Steadfastness
dua_list.arabic: يَا مُقَلِّبَ الْقُلُوبِ ثَبِّتْ قَلْبِي عَلَى دِينِكَ
dua_list.transliteration: Ya muqallibal quloob thabbit qalbi 'ala deenik
dua_list.meaning: O Turner of the hearts, make my heart firm upon Your religion.

dua_list.name: Dua for Protection from Harm
dua_list.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لاَ يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الأَرْضِ
dua_list.transliteration: Bismillahilladhi la yadurru ma'a ismihi shay'un fil ard
dua_list.meaning: In the name of Allah, with whose name nothing in the earth can harm.

dua_list.name: Dua for Parents
dua_list.meaning: My Lord, have mercy upon them as they brought me up when I was small.

dua_list.name: Dua for Forgiveness of Sins
dua_list.transliteration: Rabbi ighfir li khati'ati wa jahli
dua_list.meaning: My Lord, forgive my mistakes and ignorance.

dua_list.name: Dua for Success
dua_list.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً
dua_list.transliteration: Rabbana atina fid-dunya hasanah wa fil-akhirati hasanah
dua_list.meaning: Our Lord, give us good in this world and good in the Hereafter.

dua_list.name: Dua for Strength in Faith
dua_list.meaning: My Lord, increase me in faith.

dua_list.name: Dua for Mercy
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, I ask You for Your mercy.

dua_list.name: Dua for Protection from Satan
dua_list.meaning: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed Satan.

dua_list.name: Dua for Protection from Evil
dua_list.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا صَنَعْتُ
dua_list.transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min sharri ma sanat
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done.

dua_list.name: Dua for Anxiety
dua_list.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ
dua_list.transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal hammi wal-hazan
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety and sorrow.

dua_list.name: Dua for Light
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, place light in my heart.

dua_list.name: Dua for Strengthening Iman
dua_list.meaning: My Lord, increase me in faith and conviction.

dua_list.name: Dua for Sustenance
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, grant me lawful and good sustenance.

dua_list.name: Dua for Contentment
dua_list.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الرِّضَا بَعْدَ الْقَضَاءِ
dua_list.transliteration: Allahumma inni asaluka ar-rida ba’dal qada’
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, I ask You for contentment after the decree.

dua_list.name: Dua for Protection from Illness
dua_list.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْبَرَصِ وَالْجُنُونِ وَالْجُذَامِ
dua_list.transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal barasi wal junooni wal juthami
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from leprosy, madness, and serious illness.

dua_list.name: Dua for Shifa (Healing)
dua_list.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اشْفِنِي شِفَاءً لَا يُغَادِرُ سَقَمًا
dua_list.transliteration: Allahumma ishfini shifaan la yughadiru saqaman
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, heal me with a healing that leaves no illness.

dua_list.name: Dua for Protection Against Enemies
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, suffice me against them as You will.

dua_list.name: Dua for Mercy Upon the Deceased
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, forgive them and have mercy on them.

dua_list.name: Dua for Help in Hardships
dua_list.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَحْسِنْ عَاقِبَتَنَا فِي الْأُمُورِ كُلِّهَا
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, make the end of our affairs good.

dua_list.name: Dua for the Sick
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, Lord of mankind, remove the affliction.

dua_list.name: Dua for Relief from Distress
dua_list.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ كُلِّ خَيْرٍ
dua_list.transliteration: Allahumma inni asaluka min kulli khayrin
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, I ask You for all that is good.

dua_list.name: Dua for Guidance in Decision Making
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, I consult You in my affairs.

dua_list.name: Dua for Entering a Home
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, I ask You for the best of entrances.

dua_list.name: Dua for Family
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, unite us in the Gardens of Bliss.

dua_list.name: Dua for Fear of Allah
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, place Your fear in my heart.

dua_list.name: Dua for Daily Needs
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, suffice me in my needs.

dua_list.name: Dua for Blessings in Livelihood
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, bless me in my provision.

dua_list.name: Dua for Happiness
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, You are happiness.

dua_list.name: Dua for Protection Against Poverty
dua_list.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْفَقْرِ
dua_list.transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min al-faqr
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from poverty.

dua_list.name: Dua for Trust in Allah
dua_list.meaning: Allah is sufficient for me; in Him, I place my trust.

dua_list.name: Dua for a Good End
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, make my end good.

dua_list.name: Dua for Blessings in Knowledge
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge.

dua_list.name: Dua for Being Grateful
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, make me among the grateful.

dua_list.name: Dua for Wealth
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, I ask You for wealth that suffices me.

dua_list.name: Dua for Reuniting with Loved Ones
dua_list.transliteration: Allahumma ajma'ni bi ahli wa ahibbati
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, unite me with my family and loved ones.

dua_list.name: Dua for Light in Life
dua_list.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ لِي نُورًا فِي قَلْبِي
dua_list.transliteration: Allahumma aj'al li nooran fi qalbi
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, grant me light in my heart.

dua_list.name: Dua for Success in Endeavors
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, open for me the doors of Your mercy.

dua_list.name: Dua for Clarity of Mind
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, inspire me towards good.

dua_list.name: Dua for Humility
dua_list.meaning: O Allah, make me among the humble.
